text: Lady and Gent is a 1932 American sports drama movie. It was directed by Stephen Roberts. Actors include George Bancroft, Wynne Gibson, Charles Starrett, John Wayne, and James Gleason. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was remade as Unmarried in 1939. ==Other websites== * Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Lady and Gent
